main.name: Dr. Saurabh Bhaskar Shaw
main.description: Experienced data scientist, translational neuroscientist, and neurotechnology enthusiast
main.bio: I am a translational neuroscientist focused on using machine learning tools to better understand the spatiotemporal dynamics of brain networks and to develop clinically viable neurotechnologies aimed at improving the clinical diagnosis and treatment of neurological and psychological disorders, such as PTSD and concussion.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me using the form below
